item.description:
Announcing October’s Chai Tech Event:

Featuring Jeff Bussgang

We are excited to announce the first event of the New Year for The Chai Tech event: a free, monthly networking event for Jewish entrepreneurs and professionals in the technology industry.

Jeff Bussgang is a general partner of Flybridge Capital Partners and will be speaking about his new book Mastering the VC Game.

Tuesday, October 19
6:30 - 8:30 p.m.
Lir, 903 Boylston St., Boston 02115

Cost: Free, just don't forget your business cards!

You MUST Register through this link: http://chaitech.event...

Jeffrey Bussgang, a successful serial entrepreneur for ten years, is now a general partner at Flybridge Capital Partners, an early-stage venture capital firm with more than $500 million under management. Before becoming a venture capitalist, he was the cofounder of Upromise, the largest private source of college funding contributions in the United States. He serves as an entrepreneur in residence at Harvard Business School, where he earned an MBA with highest distinction. Bussgang writes a popular blog, www.SeeingBothSides.com.

This networking opportunity is available to Jewish professionals of all ages and from all sectors of the high-tech community. Please join us!

For more information, please contact Larry at Larryt@cjp.org or 617-457-8732.

Visit “CJP Technology Industry Group” on Facebook for more details!


Rachel Blankstein

Chai Tech Group Chair
item.name: Chai Tech Event Featuring VC Jeff Bussgang
